title: (x) SGI - proprietary face {Stephen}
content:
hi there,   
does somebody know the font-name?   
   
thx

comments.content:
This is a custom-drawn font for SGI. See this [thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150112051557/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontForums/read.php?f=5&i=3203&t=3200) at the MyFonts forums.   
   
Stephen

Thanks Stephen. If I find a similar font, I will post it.   
   
Romesh
